WorkItem.Description:
I was creating a new Windows Phone 8 app and when I went to reference HtmlAgilityPack, even after installing the Nuget package I keep being told that VS is unable to find a reference to both it, and HtmlDocumentLoadedComplete.

I tried to create another new project to see if it was just a one off, but it wont work either.

Does anyone have suggestions?
WorkItem.Summary: HtmlAgilityPack not working for new programs in VS2013

Comments.Message:
SOLVED: Well sort of.
I just downgraded the version.
